name: 蔡逸萍
objective: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
schedule:
WEEK　　SESSION THEME
1　　Introduction
2     　　Translation: Theory and practice I (Evangelism Parable: Cross-Cultural Translation Problems)
3     　　Translation: Theory and practice II (Translation of practical texts: advertisement)
4     　　Translation: Theory and practice III (Translation of practical texts: brochures)
5    　　Translation: Theory and practice IV (Translation of practical texts: recipes)
6    　　Translation: Theory and practice V (Translation of pop culture I)
7    　　Translation: Theory and practice VI (Translation of pop culture II)
8    　　Group presentation and discussion I
9    　　Group Presentation and discussion II
10   　　Translation and business I
11   　　Translation and business II
12   　　Translation and media: subtitling I
13   　　Translation and media: subtitling II
14   　　Translation and media: subtitling III
15   　　Group presentation and discussion III
16   　　Group presentation and discussion IV
17   　　Wrap-up
18    　　Final
scorePolicy:
Assessment:
-　　30% on group presentations
-　　30% on final examination
-　　40% on continual assessments: attendance to lectures; in-class performance; HOMEWORK

3.　　翻譯實務 周兆祥著/台灣商務印書館
